Welcome - 欢迎 - Karibu!   Welcome to the Kong Lab's website. We are a structural biology lab in the Department of Biochemistry and Molecular Pharmacology in the NYU School of Medicine at NYU Langone Medical Center .   Our research centers around HIV vaccine immunogen design and the study of host-pathogen interactions in urothelial tract infections.   Please contact us if you have any questions, either about our lab or this website. Thanks for visiting!
